name: TicTacToe XOXO
description:
Tic Tac Toe XOXO is a fun, addictive yet simple puzzle game. You place pieces to achieve the highest possible score to beat others, your friends or yourself!

HOW TO PLAY:

The game is very simple, you just need to hold and drag the pieces that are spawned at the bottom to a place on the board. You can tap to rotate the shape. Like in the old game if you place three blocks of a same kind they will vanish and earn you some points. 

There are also 2 bonuses that you can use when you unlock them.
